examples: Her ethnic origins are French.

influenced by ethnic and cultural ties

Britain is sleepwalking its way to a society of ethnic enclaves.
Under-achievement by ethnic minority pupils in the UK has been a matter of concern since the 1960s.
She doesn't care for ethnic humor.
People from ethnic minorities often face prejudice.

a campaign of terror against ethnic minority groups

Hundreds were killed in ethnic clashes in the region last month.

children who were raised in a home where there was a strong ethnic consciousness

a model who owes his striking good looks to his markedly piebald ethnic background
I do believe it is possible for different ethnic groups to live together in harmony.

The shooting inflamed ethnic tensions.

varied ethnic traditions of the immigrants

In that neighborhood of New York, we were all ethnics.

The U.S. has a wide variety of ethnic groups made up of immigrants or their descendants.

example_translate: По происхождению она француженка.

под влиянием этнических и культурных связей

кампании террора против этнических меньшинств

дети, которые выросли в семье с сильным этническим самосознанием

разнообразные этнические традиции иммигрантов
